Package validator

Class IdCodeValidator

java.lang.Object
validator.IdCodeValidator
public final class IdCodeValidator extends Object
Utility class for validating finnish personal ID number input.

  • Method Details

    • validate

      public static boolean validate(String idCode)
      Checks if a given finnish personal ID number is valid.
      Parameters:
      idCode - Finnish personal ID number to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the given finnish personal ID number is valid false otherwise

    • checkLength

      private static boolean checkLength(String idCode)
      Checks the length of a given finnish personal ID number.
      Parameters:
      idCode - Finnish personal ID number to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the given finnish personal ID number's length is 11. false otherwise

    • checkDate

      private static boolean checkDate(String idCode)
      Checks if the birthdate portion of a given finnish personal ID number is a valid date. This method for validating date was borrowed from stackoverflow.
      Parameters:
      idCode - Finnish personal ID number to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the given finnish personal ID number's birthdate is valid false otherwise
      See Also:
      • stackoverflow
